actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-970.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 236 - 146 (Record Vote No: 463).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3191) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt conventions, et cetera, held on cruise ships documented under the laws of the United States from certain rules relating to foreign conventions.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3191 (Tax rules for conventions held on cruise ships).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3191) to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt conventions, et cetera, held on cruise ships documented under the laws of the United States from certain rules relating to foreign conventions.
